author: arkurth
msg: Updated vcld to only retrieve the full request info once for cluster requests. It was retrieving the same info over and over for each reservation. Added reverse sort to reservation loop so that the parent reservation is forked last.

author: swagle
msg: AMBARI-1560. Upgrade action/task support in server. (Sumit Mohanty via swagle)

author: swagle
msg: AMBARI-1561. API should return nagios_alerts as a JSON, not a stringified JSON. (swagle)

author: owulff
msg: Login token made available in FederationPrincipal
